text: Baldric de Segillo was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1163 to 1177. He was Master of King Stephen's Writing Chamber and a Prebendary of Lincoln Cathedral.University of Leicester == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:12th-century English clergy Category:Lincoln Cathedral
title: Baldric de Segillo
